imdb.plot outline: Door Knockers features home improvement intervention. In each episode, unsuspecting homeowners get a knock on their front door, and before they know it, a crew of contractors is bringing out the power tools and doing on-the-spot transformations. With plenty of surprises along the way, and no shortage of do-it-yourself makeover madness, these people get an opportunity to change their home with a knock on their door.
imdb.title: Door Knockers
plot: _Door Knockers_ (qv) features home improvement intervention. In each episode, unsuspecting homeowners get a knock on their front door, and before they know it, a crew of contractors is bringing out the power tools and doing on-the-spot transformations. With plenty of surprises along the way, and no shortage of do-it-yourself makeover madness, these people get an opportunity to change their home with a knock on their door.
